title: Distinguished Member update
body:
Hey everyone,

You might have noticed some new purple names floating around =D

Elam and Lord Sesshomaru are our newest members. They've shown great attitude and provided a lot of helpful information in discussions.

You can read more about Distinguished Members here - http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/GLk0EEmq-introducing-the-distinguished-members

If you see them around make sure to say hi =D

replies.body:
Hey all ^^
Hopefully I can be some help :)
So the guy who complained about League on the boards 24/7 finally decided to suck up to Riot hey?
All he did was provide meaningful info on the boards and addressed some balancing issues (such as how bs Darius, Lee Sin and Yasuo are)
"Addressed some balancing issues" or "complained"

The main reason these people got this 'distinguished' tag is because they helped the community, yes, but also because they weren't toxic and swearing in the comments of fellow boards members. I don't suppose you aren't guilty of harassing and bullying others are you?

> [{quoted}](name=Fitzky,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=HPdnAtFE,comment-id=0000000000000001000000000001,timestamp=2017-01-17T12:02:02.195+0000)
>
> Heartvine, do us all a favour, get off the fucking boards please


Mind you, this was you on your latest post, 'Someone wanna tell me...'. 

If you so want me to, I could get Heartvine to confirm
You seem to think I'm complaining about him becoming a distinguished member but I really don't care I just thought it was quite funny since he used to hate on Riot
Don't we all?
I used to think so until I met some of the people on the boards who take Riots side in absolutely anything no matter how unfair and bullshit the topic is *cough* HEARTVINE *cough*

> [{quoted}](name=Fitzky,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=oblohAe0,comment-id=00000001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-18T07:04:55.398+0000)
>
> I used to think so until I met some of the people on the boards who take Riots side in absolutely anything no matter how unfair and bullshit the topic is *cough* HEARTVINE *cough*

*COUGH* Server skin *COUGH*

*COUGH* Quinn in 5.23 *COUGH*

*COUGH* Boards moderation *COUGH*

Out of curiosity, what was your problem with boards moderation? I'm aware of your stance on the other two, but I must have missed that last one. I'd be very interested to know where you think we could improve on that one, especially since it's something I actually have a say on :P
It's nothing to do with Emissaries, rather I was referring to the whole "Mystery Mod" fiasco from the start of last year.

Ohhhhh fair enough, yeah I looked through your deletion history cause I remember you mentioning it, and there was only maybe one or two I would have considered legit, and even they were borderline. I'm afraid I can't give you any real insight into that other than it was pretty bogus :(
But does it really justify to tell them to "do us all a favour, get off the fucking boards please"?
If they continue to piss you off enough, yes.

> [{quoted}](name=StealthVortex88,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=oblohAe0,comment-id=00000001000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-18T06:17:16.206+0000)
>
> The main reason these people got this 'distinguished' tag is because they helped the community, yes, but also because they weren't toxic and swearing in the comments of fellow boards members. I don't suppose you aren't guilty of harassing and bullying others are you?
> 
> 
> Mind you, this was you on your latest post, 'Someone wanna tell me...'. 
> 
> If you so want me to, I could get Heartvine to confirm

tbh getting distinguished member isn't hard I just don't know why people care enough about boards to put in any sort of effort to their posts.

Aw shit Lord Sesshy made it.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Thanks man :)
I'd love to see you in purple someday too! ^^

Ha, that'll be the day!

Sure I'm helpful, but I don't take kindly to idiots and have an extremely abrasive and nihilistic personality.

Oh wait the OCE Rioters swear on public streams. :^)
Hahaha you're all goods man xD

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=oblohAe0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-18T02:49:38.720+0000)
>
> Hey all ^^
> Hopefully I can be some help :)

Congrats man, you deserve it :)

Greetings Everyone :3
If you have any questions don't hesitate to ask.

~Elam
Do you work for Legacy eSports? :)
Yeap, I am the graphic designer.
How long have you played League for Friend? 0:

I have been playing since around the time Ahri came out ^^
(2011)

Ehm...... Congrats on the role, but first of all could you please delete the specific date?
It's one of the questions for the acc retrieval process, and it's very hush hush, so giving out the specific date goes a long way towards protecting your account, so now that you have a color it's not only a bad example to set, but it can be detrimental to someone else.

It sucks I know, welcome to the club :/
Thank you for informing me, will be sure not to do again in the future.
Hello.
So now I know how to become a distinguished member, write a fucking essay on every post
Can I have a "fucking asshole" role pls ty
lol elam and lord S are ass holes? lol get madder kid

> [{quoted}](name=CHEESYLEEKS,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=oblohAe0,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-01-18T03:02:13.013+0000)
>
> lol elam and lord S are ass holes? lol get madder kid

I dont think I called them assholes retard Im saying I want my own role that lets people know I am a **c**unt
k, they should call it the "mad 12vie"

> [{quoted}](name=CHEESYLEEKS,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=oblohAe0,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-18T03:07:57.907+0000)
>
> k, they should call it the "mad 12vie"

that or just "autistic shitposter"

> [{quoted}](name=Niji,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=oblohAe0,comment-id=00020000000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-18T03:08:25.631+0000)
>
> that or just "autistic shitposter"

Actually, "Autistic sh!tposter" would (probably) be me.

For you two it would be more like "Uptight Asshole".
I'd be the guy who joins conversations that don't really have anything to do with them and is a 'minor annoyance'.
nah your title would be "Top Cuck"
I'm pretty sure its the other way around lmao
And another reason boards are starting to sicken me.

> [{quoted}](name=Valor Carrys,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=oblohAe0,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-01-18T23:18:08.850+0000)
>
> And another reason boards are starting to sicken me.

Things like this is why places like reddit suck, people start caring more about their image and internet points than actually being real human beans. Every post becomes boring copy+paste tier material and everyone only shares the "most correct opinion" on matters.

> [{quoted}](name=Niji,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=oblohAe0,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-01-19T03:44:16.520+0000)
>
> Things like this is why places like reddit suck, people start caring more about their image and internet points than actually being real human beans. Every post becomes boring copy+paste tier material and everyone only shares the "most correct opinion" on matters.

One day I too aspire to become a human bean.
